title: Bug 116786 - Library include should store relative path.
OB: The report design currently stores the absolute path for including libraries. It should instead save the relative path.
SR: To reproduce the issue, follow these steps: 1. Open the report design file. 2. Locate the library include section. 3. Check the value of the 'fileName' property. 4. Verify that it contains the absolute path instead of a relative path.
